Sentencas: Fuel cells convert the chemical energy of a reaction into electrical energy in a continuous and direct way.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The modular construction, noise and vibration absences, operating flexibility, much lower pollutants production and higher conversion efficiency make these devices very attractive for the future of energy sector.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Among the different ongoing fuel cells, planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) are very promising.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The operation temperature is in the region of 800degreesC and they are specially aimed for electricity generation in small decentralized units.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: However, their price is not competitive yet in comparison Both conventional technology because of several problems related to materials optimization.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: One of the important challenges is referred to the attainment of a seal that ensures the gas-tightness of the SOFCs at the operating temperature.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Glasses or glass-ceramics are the most adecuated materials to fulfil the sealing requirements for this application.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In the present paper a worldwide overview is given outlining the different glasses and glass-ceramics employed in the sealing of SOFC so far, as well as their properties, advantages and drawbacks and a brief description about the SOFC technology.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Finally, preparation and characterization of glass-ceramics from the system SiO2-BaO-RO-Al2O3 is put forward as possible candidates for sealing SOFC.
Titulo: Glass and glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)
